title: A General History of the Robberies and Murders of the Most Notorious Pyrates
note: First published 1724 [London, printed for Ch Rivington ..., http://id.lib.harvard.edu/alma/990124772300203941/catalog] / 1724 2nd ed with considerable additions [London, Printed for and sold by T Warner, http://id.lib.harvard.edu/alma/990124775100203941/catalog] / 1725 3rd ed [London, T Warner, http://id.lib.harvard.edu/alma/990124772290203941/catalog] / 1726 [missg] ed in two vols
